# defaultConfiguration

**Instance Property**

The default configuration for operations in the group.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var defaultConfiguration: CKOperation.Configuration! { get set }
```

## Discussion

If an operation in the group has its own configuration, that configuration’s values override the default configuration’s values. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKOperation/Configuration-swift.class].

## Configuring an Operation Group

- **expectedReceiveSize**: The estimated size of traffic to download from CloudKit.
- **expectedSendSize**: The estimated size of traffic to upload to CloudKit.
- **name**: The operation group’s name.
- **operationGroupID**: The operation group’s unique identifier.
- **quantity**: The number of operations in the operation group.
- **CKOperationGroup.TransferSize**: Constants that represent possible data transfer sizes.
